sentences.en: El Salvador has earned the dubious distinction of having the worst soil erosion in continental America.
sentences.cn: 萨尔瓦多因是美洲大陆土壤侵蚀最严重的地方而有了这份不光彩的名声。

sentences.en: He has the dubious distinction of being the first railway baron to go bankrupt.
sentences.cn: 他担着首位破产铁路大亨的名声,这也算是种荣誉吧.

sentences.en: He often hangs around with some dubious characters.
sentences.cn: 他常常和一些不三不四的人鬼混.

sentences.en: He uses some dubious shifts to get money.
sentences.cn: 他用一些可疑的手段去赚钱.

sentences.en: I was rather dubious about the whole idea.
sentences.cn: 我对这整个想法持怀疑态度。

sentences.en: If his dubious transactions come to the notice of the authorities, he'll get it in the neck.
sentences.cn: 如果他不诚实的交易给当局察觉了, 他就要受到严厉的惩罚.

sentences.en: Many critics regard this argument as dubious or, at best, misleading.
sentences.cn: 许多批评家认为这一论点靠不住，或者说至少有误导性。

sentences.en: My parents were a bit dubious about it all at first but we soon convinced them.
sentences.cn: 起初我父母亲对此尚心存疑虑，但很快我们便说服了他们。

sentences.en: My parents were dubious about it at first but we soon convinced them.
sentences.cn: 我父母起初对此心存疑虑，但是我们很快就让他们信服了。

sentences.en: Soho was still a highly dubious area.
sentences.cn: 索霍区仍然是个靠不住的地方。

sentences.en: The assumption that growth in one country benefits the whole world is highly dubious .
sentences.cn: 一国的经济增长会对全世界有益的假设是很值得怀疑的。

sentences.en: The firm was accused of dubious accounting practices.
sentences.cn: 该公司被指控有不诚实的会计行为。

sentences.en: The testimony given by him is dubious.
sentences.cn: 他所作的证据是可疑的.

sentences.en: The tests have been shown to be of dubious validity.
sentences.cn: 这些试验的有效性已显得令人怀疑.

sentences.en: They would now find some dubious pretext to restart the war.
sentences.cn: 他们现在会找个蹩脚的借口重新发动战争。

sentences.en: This claim seems to us to be rather dubious.
sentences.cn: 在我们看来这种说法非常可疑。

sentences.en: What he said yesterday was dubious.
Why people are prepared to tolerate a four hour journey each day for the dubious privilege of living in the country is beyond my ken.
sentences.cn: 为了农村生活的模糊的好处,人们为何甘愿忍受每天在路上花四个小时,这便超越了我的见识了.

trans.tran_cn: 怀疑的，可疑的，不光彩的
trans.tran_en: probably not honest, true, right etc
